summary: The test suite validates core functionalities of the layout package, including array configuration handling, geographic coordinate utilities, and telescope position management. Tests cover telescope addition, coordinate and altitude processing, data export, indexing, length reporting, site configuration for northern and southern observatories, scaling factors, CRS definitions (local, UTM, WGS84), geocentric radius calculations, reference point validation, and string representation of positions.
business_intent: Ensure reliable and accurate modeling of observatory layouts and coordinate transformations, supporting precise telescope placement and data handling for astronomical operations.
